name: Raptors VS E750/Scorpios Rex
description:
Raptor Controls-W=jump, Q=attack, A=move left, D=move right. Scorpios Rex Controls-Up Arrow=jump, Space=attack, Left Arrow=move left, Right Arrow=move right, Down Arrow=tail whip.

The game has some features that will be added soon. Currently, only Charlie is playable and the charcoal colored Scorpios Rex. Delta, Echo, Blue and the navy blue/grayish Scorpios are on the way. Damage and health are almost done and a character select screen will be added with the new skins
